title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry pancetta or bacon with garlic until crispy, then remove garlic.
In a bowl, beat eggs and mix with Parmesan cheese.
Drain pasta and add to the pan with pancetta.
Remove from heat, then quickly stir in the egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken pieces until lightly charred.
In a pan, heat butter and saut√© onions, garlic, and ginger.
Add canned tomatoes and cook until sauce thickens.
Blend sauce if smooth consistency is desired.
Stir in cream and add grilled chicken pieces.
Simmer for 10 minutes, garnish with coriander, and serve with rice or naan.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: Tender strips of beef cooked in a creamy mushroom and onion sauce, served over noodles or rice.
instructions: Season beef slices with salt and pepper, then lightly coat with flour.
Heat oil and butter in a skillet, sear beef strips quickly, then set aside.
In the same pan, cook onions and mushrooms until softened.
Add beef stock and simmer until sauce reduces slightly.
Return beef to the pan and stir in sour cream.
Simmer gently for 5 minutes and serve over noodles or rice.
